W

weatherCodeToString(int) - Static method in class utils.Conversions
Returns a String with a in words of the latest weather conditions formatted to be displayed on the Latest Readings summary cards.
weatherFromCode - Variable in class models.Station
Current weather conditions from code.
weatherIcon - Variable in class models.Station
String that contains Fomantic UI semantic code to set the appropriate current weather icon.
weatherIconFromCode(int) - Static method in class utils.Conversions
Returns a String with the Fomatic UI code to generate an appropriate icon for the Latest Readings summary cards.
windBft - Variable in class models.Station
Wind speed as a reading converted from Km/h to the Beaufort Scale (Bft).
windChill - Variable in class models.Station
The wind chill factor ("feels like") in degrees Celcius.
windChillCalc(double, double) - Static method in class utils.Conversions
Calculates the wind chill factor ("feels like") using the current wind speed and temperature readings.
windDirection - Variable in class models.Reading
The wind direction value for the Reading in degrees.
windDirection - Variable in class models.Station
Direction the wind is blowing in, measured in degrees.
windDirectionOutput - Variable in class models.Station
A destription in words of the direction the wind is blowing in.
windDirectionToString(int) - Static method in class utils.Conversions
This method accepts a value for the direction of the wind in degrees and returns a String of words describing the wind direction.
windSpeed - Variable in class models.Reading
The wind speed value for the Reading in Km/h.
windToBft(double) - Static method in class utils.Conversions
This method accepts a value for the speed of the wind in Km/h (double) and returns an int with the speed in the Beaufort Scale (Bft).
windTrends - Variable in class models.Station
Are the three most recent wind speed readings RISING or FALLING?
